title: april 3: changing beauty standards [hosted by: Ricky Montgomery] (with Wallice)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Ricky talks about a law in France designed to promote healthier standards of beauty. After, he’s joined by musical guest Wallice. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
